speaker: Customer
text: You have reached the voicemail of John Smith. Please leave your name and number after the beep.

speaker: Agent
text: Hi John, this is Lisa from XYZ Collections. I'm calling about your outstanding balance.

speaker: Customer
text: To leave a message, press one or simply wait for the tone.

speaker: Agent
text: It’s important to discuss this matter as soon as possible. You can reach me at 1-800-555-0199.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for calling. Have a great day!
